title: HSPFactPayload_v0.1
description: Schema for HSP Fact Payload version 0.1. Represents a statement about the world or an entity.

id.description: Unique identifier for this fact instance.

statement_type.description: Specifies the representation of the core assertion.

statement_nl.description: The assertion in natural language (optional if statement_structured is present).

statement_structured.description: Structured representation of the assertion (e.g., semantic triple, JSON-LD object). Optional if statement_nl is present.

source_ai_id.description: ID of the AI originating or asserting this fact (e.g., DID or URI).

original_source_info.description: Information about the ultimate source if learned externally.

timestamp_created.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp of when this fact was asserted/created.

timestamp_observed.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp of when the described event was observed or occurred.

confidence_score.description: The AI's confidence in the truth of this fact.

valid_from.description: Timestamp from which the fact is considered valid.

valid_until.description: Timestamp until which the fact is considered valid.

context.description: Key-value pairs describing the context in which this fact is true.

tags.description: Keywords or categories associated with the fact.

access_policy_id.description: Identifier for a policy governing sharing/use of this fact.
